title: Vectra Entity Score Change Insights
description: This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into Vectra entity score changes, enabling monitoring of scoring activity, analysis of risk and urgency trends, identification of high-priority entities, and detailed investigation of scoring change events to support effective threat prioritization and response.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into Vectra entity score changes, enabling monitoring of scoring activity, analysis of risk and urgency trends, identification of high-priority entities, and detailed investigation of scoring change events to support effective threat prioritization and response.

For more information, see the [Vectra Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vectra/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
This group provides a high-level view of entity scoring activity, highlighting total scoring events, score change trends over time, entity types, and category distribution.

This group provides detailed insights into entity score changes, including prioritized and high-urgency entities, severity distribution, scoring metrics (importance, urgency, velocity, attack rating, breadth), trend analysis, and detailed scoring event records.
